name: Klondike & Girls Cards Girls 2 collection
detailed_description:
Additional kit includes all the files used to create 2 deck of cards.
Pictures in .PNG format on a transparent background and have a resolution of 1000 x 1429 pixels. In the collection of 52 pictures.

Files will be placed in your Klondike & Girls folder in the Steam Directory:
"...Steam\steamapps\common\Klondike & Girls\Collection 2"
